This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2015
http://gotochgo.com

Vyacheslav Egorov - Java Script Performance Expert, SW Engineer on the Google Dart Team

ABSTRACT
JavaScript is everywhere. JavaScript VMs improve by leaps and bounds. Performance graphs are breaking through the ceilings of expectations. And yet from time to time we still find ourselves wondering whether [...]
